item.title: 研究显示：中国的抵押品需求限制了新兴国家的财务管理能力
item.description: 周四发表的一份研究报告显示，中国通过商品收入流和受限代管账户中的现金为其向低收入国家提供的贷款提供担保的做法正在削弱这些国家有效管理财务的能力。【原文：China's practice of securing its loans to low-income nations through commodity revenue streams and cash held in restricted escrow accounts is curbing their ability to manage their finances effectively, a study published on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 科技游说团体敦促欧盟领导人暂停执行人工智能法案
item.description: 科技游说团体欧洲人工智能协会（CCIA Europe）的成员包括 Alphabet、Meta 和苹果公司，该协会周四敦促欧盟暂停实施《人工智能法案》，称匆忙推出该法案可能会危及欧洲大陆的人工智能愿望。【原文：Tech lobbying group CCIA Europe, whose members include Alphabet , Meta and Apple , on Thursday urged European Union to pause implementation of the AI Act, saying a rushed roll-out risks jeopardizing the continent’s AI aspirations.】

item.title: Invesco 申请 Solana ETF，以满足日益增长的比特币替代品需求
item.description: 根据周三提交的一份监管文件，Invesco 已申请设立与索拉纳现货价格挂钩的交易所交易基金，资产管理公司正努力挖掘比特币以外的机会。【原文：Invesco has filed for an exchange-traded fund tied to the spot price of Solana , according to a regulatory filing on Wednesday, as asset managers push to tap opportunities beyond bitcoin .】

item.title: 特朗普支持的加密公司正计划对稳定币进行审计，并推出新的应用程序
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的加密货币平台世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）的联合创始人扎克-福克曼（Zak Folkman）周三表示，该公司将在 "几天内 "发布对其稳定币的审计报告，并计划推出一款新的应用程序。【原文：Zak Folkman, the co-founder of U.S. President Donald Trump's cryptocurrency platform World Liberty Financial, said on Wednesday that the company will issue an audit of its stablecoin "within days" and that it planned a new app.】

item.title: 交易日 旋风褪去，回归平静
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 雀巢美国公司将于 2026 年中期逐步停止使用合成食用色素
item.description: 雀巢美国公司周三表示，将在 2026 年年中之前从其美国食品和饮料产品组合中完全淘汰合成食用色素。【原文：Nestle USA said on Wednesday that it would fully eliminate synthetic food colors from its U.S. food and beverage portfolio by mid-2026.】

item.title: 股票承销疲软，杰富瑞利润大跌；2025 年晚些时候有望反弹
item.description: 杰富瑞第二季度的利润下降了近 40%，原因是股票承销的疲软抵消了兼并咨询费带来的收益，但这家投资银行表示，随着经济前景变得更加明朗，交易活动可能会在 2025 年晚些时候反弹。【原文：Jefferies' profit fell nearly 40% in the second quarter as equity underwriting weakness offset gains from merger advisory fees, but the investment bank said dealmaking could rebound later in 2025 as the economic outlook becomes clearer.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，卡尔希在最新一轮融资中估值 20 亿美元
item.description: Kalshi 首席执行官塔里克-曼苏尔（Tarek Mansour）周三在 X 上发表文章称，Kalshi 在本轮融资中筹集了 1.85 亿美元，该预测市场的估值达 20 亿美元。【原文：Kalshi has raised $185 million in a funding round that values the prediction marketplace at $2 billion, its CEO Tarek Mansour said in a post on X on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美光预计季度营收高于预期，因人工智能驱动内存芯片需求增长
item.description: 美光科技公司（Micron Technology）周三预测第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注于数据中心人工智能硬件所用内存芯片的强劲需求。【原文：Micron Technology forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on robust demand for its memory chips used for artificial intelligence hardware in data centers.】

item.title: 监管机构命令房利美和房地美在贷款评估中考虑加密货币持有量
item.description: 房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）的监管机构周三命令这两家住房巨头将加密货币视为单户抵押贷款风险评估的一种资产，此举有可能为借款人利用加密货币投资来获得住房贷款资格打开大门。【原文：The regulator overseeing Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac on Wednesday ordered the housing giants to consider cryptocurrency as an asset for single-family mortgage loan risk assessments, a move that could potentially open the door to borrowers using crypto investments to qualify for home loans.】

item.title: 分析师预测人工智能 "黄金浪潮"，英伟达创历史新高
item.description: 本周三，英伟达（Nvidia）的股价创下历史新高，这家芯片制造商重新夺回了全球最有价值公司的桂冠，此前有分析师称这家芯片制造商将乘上人工智能的 "黄金浪潮"。【原文：Nvidia's stock hit a record high on Wednesday, and the chipmaker reclaimed the crown as the world's most valuable company after an analyst said the chipmaker was set to ride a "Golden Wave" of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 全球疫苗组织加维在筹资峰会后获得 90 亿美元资金
item.description: 全球疫苗组织加维（Gavi）董事会主席若泽-曼努埃尔-巴罗佐（Jose Manuel Barroso）周三表示，该组织已获得 90 亿美元资金，用于未来五年帮助世界上最贫困儿童接种疫苗。【原文：Global vaccine group Gavi has secured $9 billion for its work over the next five years helping to immunize the world's poorest children, its board chair, Jose Manuel Barroso, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉机器人出租车在得克萨斯州测试中频频犯错
item.description: 特斯拉在得克萨斯州奥斯汀对机器人轴进行的首次公开测试导致了多个交通问题和驾驶问题，该公司挑选的车手在最初几天拍摄的视频显示了这些问题。【原文：A first public test of robotaxis by Tesla in Austin, Texas led to multiple traffic problems and driving issues, videos from company-selected riders showed over the first few days.】

item.title: 消息人士称波音聘请前诺斯罗普高管领导 "空军一号 "项目
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，波音公司已聘请诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司前高管史蒂夫-沙利文（Steve Sullivan）领导其 "空军一号 "项目。【原文：Boeing has hired a former Northrop Grumman executive, Steve Sullivan, to lead its Air Force One program, according to two people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 美国根据芬太尼制裁禁止与三家墨西哥银行进行某些交易
item.description: 作为芬太尼制裁措施的一部分，美国财政部周三禁止了涉及墨西哥 CIBanco、Intercam Banco 和 Vector Casa de Bolsa 的某些交易。【原文：The U.S. Treasury on Wednesday prohibited certain transactions involving Mexico-based CIBanco, Intercam Banco, and Vector Casa de Bolsa as part of its fentanyl sanctions.】

item.title: 美国国债面临稳定币驱动的需求激增，供应迫在眉睫
item.description: 在本周于波士顿举行的一次货币市场基金会议上，稳定币刺激短期美国国债需求的潜力成为了一个热门话题，投资者预计这些数字代币将在今年晚些时候吸收大量的政府债务供应。【原文：The potential for stablecoins to fuel demand for short-term U.S. Treasury securities was a hot topic at a money market fund conference in Boston this week, with investors expecting these digital tokens to absorb a huge supply of government debt later this year.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储大楼奢华装修的报道不准确
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三回击了有关央行在翻新工程上花费过多资金的报道，称拥有近90年历史的美联储总部 "并不安全"，同时承认成本超支。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday pushed back against reports the central bank was spending money excessively on renovations, saying that the almost 90-year-old headquarters "was not really safe," while acknowledging cost overruns.】

item.title: PIMCO 认为，在财政紧缩的情况下，降息是下一步救市的主导因素
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 表示，由于发达市场的全球公共债务居高不下，限制了政府的支出能力，因此应对未来经济衰退的努力可能更多地依赖于央行降低利率，而不是财政救命稻草。【原文：Efforts to battle future economic downturns are likely to lean more on central banks slashing interest rates than on fiscal lifelines, as high global public debt in developed markets limits governments' ability to spend, said U.S. bond giant PIMCO.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，调解员就特朗普与哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）的诉讼提出 2,000 万美元的和解方案
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，一位调解人建议派拉蒙全球公司和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就前副总统卡马拉-哈里斯接受采访一事与哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道达成和解，和解金额为 2000 万美元。【原文：A mediator has proposed that Paramount Global and U.S. President Donald Trump settle his lawsuit against CBS News over an interview with former Vice President Kamala Harris for $20 million, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储公布放宽银行杠杆率要求的提案
item.description: 美联储周三公布了一项提案，将对全球大型银行必须为相对低风险的资产持有多少资本进行全面改革，作为促进参与美国国债市场的努力的一部分。【原文：The Federal Reserve unveiled a proposal on Wednesday that would overhaul how much capital large global banks must hold against relatively low-risk assets, as part of a bid to boost participation in U.S. Treasury markets.】

item.title: 大型汽车制造商批评美国汽车安全机构，呼吁改革
item.description: 代表通用汽车公司、丰田汽车公司、大众汽车公司、现代汽车公司和其他汽车制造商的一个主要贸易团体尖锐批评了美国国家公路交通安全管理局，称该汽车安全监管机构正在阻碍进步，并在努力实现现代化。【原文：A major trade group representing General Motors Toyota Motor , Volkswagen , Hyundai and other automakers sharply criticized the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, saying the auto safety regulator is impeding progress and struggling to modernize.】

item.title: 独家报道美国允许向中国装运乙烷，但不允许卸载 -- 信件
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，美国周三致函企业产品公司和能源转运公司，通知它们可以在驶往中国的船只上装载乙烷，但未经授权不得在中国港口卸载乙烷。【原文：The U.S. sent letters to Enterprise Products and Energy Transfer on Wednesday informing the companies they could load ethane on vessels destined for China but could not unload the ethane at a port in China without authorization, according to a person familiar with the matter and copy of one letter.】

item.title: 马姆达尼担任市长引发租金冻结担忧，纽约银行和房地产投资信托下跌
item.description: 由于佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）在纽约市民主党市长初选中遥遥领先，引发了人们对他提出的租金冻结方案可能会给楼宇业主带来压力的担忧，周三纽约多家银行和房地产投资信托公司股价下跌。【原文：Shares of several New York-based banks and real estate investment trusts fell on Wednesday as Zohran Mamdani's lead in New York City's Democratic mayoral primary stoked concerns that his proposed rent freeze could pressure building owners.】

item.title: 两家投资银行寻求摆脱美国证券交易委员会分析师研究和解协议的束缚
item.description: 派博桑德勒公司（Piper Sandler）和斯蒂夫尔金融公司（Stifel Financial）周三请求法官解除美国证券交易委员会二十多年前与 12 家投资银行就分析师冲突达成的全球和解协议对它们的 "苛刻 "限制。【原文：Piper Sandler and Stifel Financial on Wednesday asked a judge to free them from "onerous" restrictions from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's global settlement more than two decades ago with 12 investment banks over analyst conflicts.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道英国石油公司收购讨论后，壳牌称 "未进行谈判
item.description: 在《华尔街日报》的一篇文章援引未具名消息人士的话称壳牌正在就收购竞争对手英国石油公司（BP）进行早期讨论后，壳牌周三表示 "没有进行任何谈判"。【原文：Shell said on Wednesday that "no talks are taking place" after a Wall Street Journal article cited unnamed sources saying Shell was in early discussions to take over rival BP .】

item.title: 独家报道福特每周四天召集大部分员工上班
item.description: 福特汽车公司正在召集大部分受薪员工每周四天返回办公室，这是该汽车制造商为提高员工和公司业绩所做的最新努力。【原文：Ford Motor is calling the majority of its salaried workforce back to the office four days a week, the automaker's latest effort to boost employee and company performance.】

item.title: 独家报道马士基就价值 10 亿美元的巴西港口拍卖提起诉讼，地中海航运集团的 TIL 或将跟进
item.description: 全球航运集团正寻求巴西法院推翻禁止它们参与拉丁美洲最大港口新集装箱码头第一轮竞标的竞争规则，该竞标将于今年晚些时候举行。【原文：Global shipping groups are looking to Brazil's courts to overturn competition rules that bar them from participating in the first round of bidding on a major new container terminal at Latin America's largest port, due to take place later this year.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构将调查玛氏 360 亿美元的 Kellanova 交易
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周三开始全面调查糖果制造商玛氏以 360 亿美元收购品客制造商凯兰诺华的交易，称该交易可能会损害竞争。【原文：EU antitrust regulators opened on Wednesday a full-scale investigation into candy maker Mars' $36 billion takeover of Pringles maker Kellanova , saying the deal may hurt competition.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称富国银行从花旗聘请帕特森负责激进主义辩护
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，富国银行已从花旗集团聘请了一位资深银行家来领导其激进主义防御业务，因为各家公司都在争相建立业务部门，以帮助面临激进投资者压力的客户。【原文：Wells Fargo has hired a senior banker from Citigroup to lead its activism defense practice, a person familiar with the situation said on Wednesday, as corporations scramble to build out business units to help clients facing pressure from activist investors.】

item.title: 智利锂矿开采商 SQM 开始裁减 5% 当地员工
item.description: 据路透社周三看到的一份发给工人的工会备忘录称，智利锂矿开采商 SQM 已开始在其智利业务中裁员。【原文：Chilean lithium miner SQM has begun laying off workers in its Chilean operations, according to a union memo to workers seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】
